articles.title: Paradox's grand strategy Star Trek Infinite will receive no further updates - Rock Paper Shotgun
articles.description: Star Trek Infinite, released in 2023 and published by grand strategy kings Paradox, will receive no further updates - much to the chagrin of its players.
articles.content:
Paradox have a reputation for updating their games in perpetuity, with both free patches and DLC, even if players would rather they stopped. Star Trek Infinite is bucking that trend, it seems.
